__prompts__.package_name: Your Python package name, in snake case (e.g. my_package)
__prompts__.license: Pick an open source license for pyproject.toml file, see https://choosealicense.com/ for details
__prompts__.license_classifier: Pick a license classifier, this has to match the previous one
__prompts__.author: Author name for pyproject.toml file
__prompts__.dev_python_version: Python version for local development, in {major}.{minor}.{micro} (e.g. 3.11.8)
__prompts__.github_token_field: GitHub token field, Read https://github.com/MacHu-GWU/home_secret-project to learn how to set up your GitHub token using home_secret.json
__prompts__.codecov_token_field: Codecov.io token field, Read https://github.com/MacHu-GWU/home_secret-project to learn how to set up your GitHub token using home_secret.json
__prompts__.readthedocs_token_field: Readthedocs.org token field, Read https://github.com/MacHu-GWU/home_secret-project to learn how to set up your GitHub token using home_secret.json
